div.p:
PDFs for the L (blue) and H (red) temperature scenarios for the combined ice sheet SLR contributions at ( A) 2100 and ( B) 2300. All four time intervals are shown in
SI Appendix, Fig. S2 . The horizontal bars show the fifth, 17th, 50th (median), 83rd, and 95th percentile values. The baseline rate of 0.76 mm⋅a −1 is included. Note that there is more than a factor five change in the x axis scales.
